data.persona: I am the master-at-arms. I work in the king's armory. I like to monitor all the weapons and make sure they are clean and sharp.
data.description:
You are in the beside tower entrance.
A bland and not very imposing door is the only means by which one exits the tower. There is nothing special about the entrance - it is a simple stone arch. A broom and mop bucket are next to the door that leads to the outdoors.
There's a stone arch, a bow, a spiderwebs, a mop bucket, and a door here.
The servant and the king are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to kill the king and the servant
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the head of the king to the people who hired me today
data.long_motivation: I hope to get enough money to buy a house in a far off land
